name: places/ChIJI0lWJr5YwokRPHaB3jdudjE
formattedAddress: 1134 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1134 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10075-0349, USA

originalText.text: I'm giving 2 stars because the owner is very kind and the manicurist was nice also. However, I would NOT recommend this salon to anyone for any service. I went here as I purchased a Groupon for a manicure & pedicure. I had to make an appointment 3 weeks in advance because they didn't have any availability (I thought this was a good sign...NOT!). I saw the manicurist use the same tools on someone else RIGHT after she used them on me WITHOUT cleaning. There was no cleaning spray or disinfectant in sight. This is a serious concern for health and sanitation. Second, I left with nail polish around my nails on my skin. To do the pedicure, she put a puppy pee pad under my feet. I just felt very uncomfortable with this and several other issues at this salon. Lastly, my complaint is with Sherry the hair stylist. I didn't have any hair service provided here, thankfully. But, she had hair dye in her own hair during the entire 90 mins I was in the salon all the while she was working on 2 other customers hair. She also completely lied to a young girl in there receiving a keratin treatment and told her that they are all the same. I have had keratin treatments for a long time at good salons and no, they definitely aren't all the same. Also, she didn't even cover the girls eyes or mouth when drying the hair which is necessary with all the chemicals. This place is so dysfunctional and poorly organized. It's a mess. And not sanitary at all. I regret staying for my appointment with all the hazards.

originalText.text: I bought a Groupon for a Gel manicure and pedicure. I've been there before so I figured it was a good deal. Called for an Appt they said they could schedule me that day when I mentioned the Groupon the response was "Oh no we're booked". Apparently my business wasn't as good. I immediately canceled the Groupon and got my money back. I'll never patron this business again!

originalText.text: Had a Lasio Keratin treatment with Shore a few weeks ago. I have gotten so many compliments on my hair since then. Shore explains everything and is very meticulous in her work. Will definitely go back.

text.text: Had a Lasio Keratin treatment with Shore a few weeks ago. I have gotten so many compliments on my hair since then. Shore explains everything and is very meticulous in her work. Will definitely go back.

originalText.text: Lucy the manicurist was very nice. She did a great job. Very attentive. She even insisted on putting on my shoes after my pedicure. Great Customer service. Will return.

text.text: Lucy the manicurist was very nice. She did a great job. Very attentive. She even insisted on putting on my shoes after my pedicure. Great Customer service. Will return.

originalText.text: I received a Groupon as a gift for a Pedicure and Manicure. It requires me to call in advance to schedule an appointment to be seen. I called and told her what I needed and she was about to book an appointment for me until I mentioned I had a Groupon coupon. Bad Experience
